Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. This exceptional item is valued at $15000 by us due to its unique features, advanced technology, and the unparalleled experience it offers. Considering its immense value and the benefits it provides, we kindly invite you to consider acquiring this product at the same price point. We believe it will be an excellent addition to your collection or business, enhancing its functionality and aesthetics. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. Thank you for considering our offer. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $15,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $15,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $15,000
